modName: FF 13 Lightning Face Preset ( Lunari Race)
summary: Face Preset for my Lightning from Final Fantasy 13
descriptionHtml:
hi this my is first uploading a mod in skyrim. i was a huge fan of the FF13 lightning mod by that japanese guy but it was only a latex mask and most youtube tut to get that that face where just..... well yes. i hope i have done a good job. it took me some time. endorse this of you like it.

Mods you NEED
Â 
on Nexus:

ApachiiSkyHair
when downloading ApachiiskyHair search for ApachiiHairFemales as an additional download

Lunari Race ( you have to use the Lunari Race. Select female gender and load up the preset)

RaceMenu
RaceMenuPrecacheKiller

not on Nexus:

SKSE http://skse.silverlock.org/

author: Rambobrill
